red sauce

Executed 12 12 18 - WIP

Ingredients

  • 2 cans diced tomatoes
  • 1/4c olive oil (as needed)
  • 4tbsp butter
  • 8 cloves garlic, pressed/minced
  • 1tbsp dried oregano and thyme, ea.
  • 1tsp red pepper flakes (to taste)
  • 1/ea medium carrot and onion, halved
  • 1tbsp fish sauce (to taste)

Directions

  1. Heat oven to 300F
  2. Sautee garlic with oregano and pepper flakes in olive oil and butter until fragrant in heavy-bottom cast iron.
  3. Once fragrant, immediately add tomatoes, stirring to break up tomatoes; once combined add carrot, halved onion, basil/thyme and stir to combine, seasoning gently with salt and pepper and a touch of sugar.
  4. Cover with lid slightly ajar and transfer to oven, cook stirring every 2 hours until reduced by half and darkened to deep red- 4-5 hours.
  5. Discard halved veg, add fish sauce (as needed, if desired), additional olive oil, salt/pepper to taste and additional herbage as needed.
